titles.title: I Love You, Lord, Just Because Of Who You Are

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I love You, Lord, just because of who You are
You are the Prince of Peace, the bright and morning star.
You rule and reign over all the universe
In glory, power, and might. I love You, Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love You, Lord, Lord of lords, King of kings;
Who was and is to come; You make my heart to sing.
Almighty God, who desires to form, and fill,
And dwell within my heart. I love You, Lord.
